name: Baidu Device ID File
summary: A CUID2 file is a hidden file created by apps that use the Baidu software development kit ( SDK ), such as ES File Explorer and WeChat. It contains your mobile device's ID and International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI), encrypted using 128-bit AES encryption . CUID2 files are used to share your device's id and International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI) with third parties without your permission.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
